data.title: React.js Developer
content: Applied advanced ReactJS and NextJS techniques to optimize component life cycle practices, ensuring efficient performance and resource management in the development of both web and desktop applications.
Acquired expertise in Web3 and Blockchain architecture, demonstrating a deep understanding of underlying mechanics for seamless application development.
Developed a React SDK for streamlined application integration, enhancing functionalities and contributing to the creation of robust software ecosystems.

data.title: Web Developer
content: Developed hackathon portal with role-based logins for MHRDâ€™S Innovation Cell (Government of India), ensuring secure idea evaluation and enabling seamless idea submission from over 160,000 students.
Engineered a dynamic social platform for college alumni, integrating profiles, networking, and discussion forums, resulting in 30% increase in user engagement.
Developed NLP chatbots that improved user interaction, delivering real-time assistance across multiple platforms and achieving a 25% reduction in support response time.
